meanings.definition: An instrument used for measuring high temperatures.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used a pyrometer to check how hot the metal was.
meanings.sent2: The pyrometer showed that the oven was at 400 degrees Celsius.
meanings.sent3: The pyrometer joked that it was so hot, it needed sunscreen!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a pyrometer, always measuring her progress.
meanings.sent5: The pyrometer beeped loudly, warning of the extreme heat.

meanings.definition: A device that detects and measures infrared radiation.
meanings.sent1: The pyrometer helped the technician find the source of the heat.
meanings.sent2: Using the pyrometer, she could see the invisible heat waves.
meanings.sent3: The pyrometer blushed when it detected a warm hug instead of radiation.
meanings.sent4: His intuition acted like a pyrometer, sensing the hidden emotions.
meanings.sent5: The pyrometer hummed softly, revealing the unseen warmth around.
